A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a waste of money. Star wars cannot decide if it wants to leech of the popularity of the old movies or do something different so it takes the crappy middle ground and kills all the interesting older characters and has new bad actors take over. Rose Sucks. Finn sucks. Rey is an ultimate mary sue whose only good parts of the film is when she is conversing with Kylo Ren who is the only surviving character with anything interesting about him. Phasma was wasted\, Snoke god damn wasted. Jokes were disney level crap and the film filled with cancerous SJW ideology!
